comments: Let b(n) = n-th number of form x^2+y^2+z^2, x,y,z >= 1 (A000408); a(n) = number of solutions (x,y,z) to x^2+y^2+z^2=b(n).The a(n) are also the degeneracies of the energy levels E(n) in the three dimensional cubic "particle-in-a-box" model in elementary quantum mechanics. - _A. Timothy Royappa_, Jan 09 2009
references: G. M. Barrow, Physical Chemistry (6th ed.), McGraw-Hill, 1996, p. 69.
author: _A. Timothy Royappa_, 1997; entry revised Jun 13 2003
extensions: More terms and better name from _Ralf Stephan_, Aug 31 2013
